name: About Tanaka
description:
This game was made in GBStudio 2.0. The art was made with Piskel. The music was made in OpenMPT

Move with arrow keys or wasd. Interact with z or j

This is a narrative based game made over the course of 8 days. It is also my first game made with an engine that isn't scratch and I've learned a lot from it that I hope I can use in future projects as I continue to learn more about game development.

Finally I hope some of you will be able to enjoy the characters I created even with the awkward dialogue at times and thank you for playing!
